conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D model: extruded walls with thickness, angled/isometric viewpoint, visible floor plane and interior volumes, and roof/ceiling removed to reveal rooms.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness and readable room volumes; clean cutaway. Minor simplification of some junctions and opening details prevents a perfect score.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall layout matches: living/dining on left, balcony bottom-left, bedroom bottom-right, toilet center-right, kitchen top-center/left, utility top-right. Minor proportional/partition placement differences and some opening details appear simplified.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture present and in correct rooms (sofa/coffee table/dining, bed, kitchen counters, bathroom fixtures). Some elements are simplified blocks and not fully detailed (e.g., limited utility/laundry detail).

visual_clarity.notes: Geometry is clean and readable with decent lighting; however, large text labels on the 3D floor reduce presentation cleanliness and slightly distract from structural reading.

detected_errors.description: Some doors/windows/openings appear simplified and may not perfectly match the exact 2D swing/orientation and proportions.
Text labels are embedded/visible in the 3D render, reducing presentation/background cleanliness.

summary: A true 3D cutaway conversion with strong layout fidelity to the 2D plan, with only minor opening-detail mismatches and distracting in-render text labels.
